GSD.description:
tty: Fix a possible resource leak in icom_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.15 by commit 23e155b51d403c0ccedc60c0d6c3c452afed07fe. For more details please see the references link.
